body: Yes it's because a lot of times when doing transpose on sparse dimensions we are effectively shrinking one of them (and expanding another), and it's inherently an unsafe operation.

body_text: Yes it's because a lot of times when doing transpose on sparse dimensions we are effectively shrinking one of them (and expanding another), and it's inherently an unsafe operation.
